title: bOING bOING Issue 13 - Media Culture Brainwash for Now People
creator: Happy Mutants
description: bOING bOING started as a zine in 1988 by Mark Frauenfelder and Carla Sinclair, his wife. Issues were subtitled "The World's Greatest Neurozine". Associate editors included Gareth Branwyn, Jon Lebkowsky, and Paco Nathan. Along with Mondo 2000 , bOING bOING was an influence in the development of the cyberpunk subculture. It reached a maximum circulation of 17,500 copies. Common themes include technology, futurism, science fiction, gadgets, intellectual property, Disney and left-wing politics. The last issue of the zine was #15. Contents saturday morning geekout - julia macassey o mighty anka - josh cereghino zine queen - carla sinclair kevin kelly: out of control - carla and mark would you buy a used tank from this girl! - john bates darkwave - david pescovitz human branding - david pescovitz fiction: "alphabet noir" - wayne alan brenner fiction: "the gentle art of corpse detection" - walt wyman beauty buddhism - pierre borque coil - jessica wing brain candy media freak music welcome - carla bouncing back notices - gossip girl nerotica - ward parkway prank time - nurse freckle shortie: brain in a vat - some brain in a body going gaga - gareth zip.5 - rudy rucker shortie: parking lots o' fun - brendan dunn greasy riders - kristy o'rell schwa comics - bill barker jokey - mack white shortie: the lazy human's guide to wealth - el jefe the real real world - judd winnick
